section.name: ToolWindow
section.p: A Tool Window is a secondary window used to provide one or more particular functionalities.

td.p: To register a tool window use the following:
td.source: ToolWindowManager toolWindowManager = new ...; ToolWindow toolwindow = toolWindowManager. registerToolWindow("Debug", // Tool Window identifier "Debugging", // Tool Window Title icon, // Tool Window Icon component, // Tool Window Component ToolWindowAnchor.LEFT // Tool Window Anchor )

section.p:
When you register a toolwindow you obtain an instance of ToolWindow interface. This interface is the main entry point to modify toolwindow's properties. Moreover there are methods to make the tool available, visible and active.
The image on left show two tabs for the toolswindow. The first is declared when the tool is registered, for the second use the following:
section.source: ToolWindowTab profilingTab = toolwindow. addToolWindowTab("Profiling", // Tab Title profilingCmp, // Tab Component )
